page.content:
LACK OF WORK
Robert and I interviewed a man who is unemployed and been so for 14 months .He had worked at Nigg. When he got paid_off he immediately went for another job ,but he was unsuccessful and has lost hope of finding any work locally. His wife is also unemployed and he is considering moving to another area to try and find work. Financially they are just able to cope but after high wages find it very difficult. With the two major employers in the area a) British Aluminium completely closed down and b) the Nigg yard almost on a care and maintenance level unemployment is very high and prospects are poor.
